title: An Act relative to preventing immigration reporting and ensuring the right to legal counsel

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Sena of Acton, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 4115) of Danillo A. Sena relative to immigration reporting and the right to legal counsel.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
